name: First Siege March to Mirado
notable_events: Initial march to establish siege camp. Reinforcements failed to materialize. The Colonel's Quixotic zest has since faded.

name: The Scavenger's Survey
notable_events: First documented encounter with Yeller by a scholarly observer. Notes fragmentary but invaluable.

name: Second Mirado Reinforcement
notable_events: Attempted to bring supplies and men to Colonel Viragu. Ambushed in the desert approach. Most supplies lost, few men reached the siege camp.

name: Western Quarry Survey
notable_events: First systematic survey of western Quarry regions. Lost four men to marsh hazards. Extensive creature documentation.

name: Fifth Expedition into the Dens Border
notable_events: Catastrophic losses to stakdur encounter. Wen Torval among the dead. His sister Jara barely escaped. Changed expedition protocols thereafter.

name: Northern Route Mapping
notable_events: Mapped previously uncharted routes from Capital to northern villages. One casualty to weather exposure.

name: Capital Survey to Yeller Quarry
notable_events: The expedition that changed Grigsu. Violence occurred, a servant or friend died. Grigsu returned sullen and angry. Yasho and Bagbu accompanied but left fewer records.

name: Sixth Quarry Creature Census
notable_events: Systematic creature census. Encountered but avoided stakdur. Valuable specimens collected.

name: Ninth Expedition Deep Survey
notable_events: Deep penetration into lower marshes. Stakdur attack killed Pollux Dann, Pell Sontar, and 25 others. Only 15 returned.

name: Memorial Survey
notable_events: Cautious expedition to honor the dead of the Fifth and Ninth. Mapped safe routes, avoided deep marsh.

name: Tenth Quarry Expedition
notable_events: Final expedition led by Hesta Vorn before retirement. Captured several rare specimens.

name: Dead River Cartographic Survey
notable_events: Bagbu's solo-led expedition. Mapped regions previously known only from contradictory maps. Confirmed that Dead River exists because maps named it.

name: The Boss's Expedition
notable_events: Infamous expedition. All hands lost including the five-fold Yeller. Only Sonter escaped, carrying heads in a bag. See MS-0052 for the daughter of the chief of police's account.

name: Eleventh Quarry Survey
notable_events: First expedition to apply water-school principles to creature observation. Controversial methodology, valuable results.

name: Dead River Eastern Reach
notable_events: Extended Bagbu's earlier mapping work. Documented settlements that had not appeared on any previous maps.

name: Modern Quarry Assessment
notable_events: Modern assessment using improved safety protocols. Documented changes in creature populations since earlier surveys.

name: Dens Border Investigation
notable_events: Investigated reports of densmuck encroachment. Confirmed that the muck had advanced several hundred yards since last survey.

name: Tripas Trade Route Survey
notable_events: Mapped safe trade routes between Capital and Tripas, avoiding stall-town dangers.

name: Northern Village Census
notable_events: Census of isolated northern villages. Documented stone-casting traditions still practiced in remote areas.

name: The Colonel's Final Push
notable_events: Renewed attempt to breach Mirado after decades of siege. Senator backing the effort for political reasons. Outcome pending.
